official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress disapproving the general postal rate increase proposed on November 10, 1983, by the United States Postal Service.
short_title: Let's Lick Them Before They Stick Us Postal User Protection Resolution of 1983

summary.text: "Let's Lick Them Before They Stick Us" Postal User Protection Resolution - Expresses congressional disapproval of the general rate increase proposed by the United States Postal Service on November 10, 1983. Urges the Postal Service to identify and adopt alternative cost effective measures which would prevent the need for such an increase.

titles.title: Let's Lick Them Before They Stick Us Postal User Protection Resolution of 1983
A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress disapproving the general postal rate increase proposed on November 10, 1983, by the United States Postal Service.
